description:
The rest of the Terminal Services people continue cheering Isla and Tsukasa on, Michiru giving them tickets to the cinema and they are encouraged to take time off from work. They go to the cinema and watch the film, which is a touching romance which makes Isla hold Tsukasa`s hand halfway through, and spend a relaxing day.
The next day, Kazuki gives Tsukasa the folder giving Isla as a retrieval target. That night, though he is deeply troubled, he signs the document saying that he accepts the retrieval. The next day they go to retrieve the gangster`s giftia Sara, and Tsukasa notices how Isla always whispers something to the giftias she retrieves. Terminal Services throws a final party for Isla. Isla tells Tsukasa that she whispers to the giftias she retrieves: "I hope that one day you`ll be reunited with the person you cherish."
